glsa.title: Dia: Format string vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Format string vulnerabilities in Dia may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Dia is a GTK+ based diagram creation program.

description.p: KaDaL-X discovered a format string error within the handling of filenames. Hans de Goede also discovered several other format string errors in the processing of dia files.

impact.p: By enticing a user to open a specially crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Dia users should upgrade to the latest available version:
